title: New free champion rotation: Ahri, Ashe, Braum & more!

replies.body: I main Irelia is it good to have a backup champ in case, I was thinking {{champion:103}}  is She any good. Plus that new Arcade Ahri Though!

Even if you're playing casually it's good to have a couple of other champs to play in other positions. I think you'd find Ahri similar to Irelia, highly mobile assassiny sort of play style with a few key differences.
Give her a shot while she's free!
Ok, I played a few games as her in normal and I absolutely love her so much! Thanks for helping {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
